commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Make command compatible with mktemp from GNU coreutils
commits.body: We could also call /usr/bin/mktemp directly (to avoid a problem for users whose PATH point to GNU coreutils before /usr/bin), but I think it is good practice to avoid BSD/macOS specific options, when possible.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Add snippet to enter * on new block comment lines

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Do not mark anything from the OpenGL.framework as deprecated

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update syntax highlight based on symbols from the macOS 10.15 SDK
commits.body: This adds about 37,000 new symbols, so perhaps too much, but I have been using it for a few days without noticing any performance issues.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update completion index with functions from the macOS 10.15 SDK
commits.body: This includes standard C library functions, most macOS frameworks, and commonly used libraries (such as curl, sqlite, icon, and zlib).

commits.author: George White
commits.summary: Add .hxx as a possible C++ header file extension

commits.author: Ronald Wampler
commits.summary: Default to honoring `.clang-format` file, if present
commits.body: If a file `.clang-format` is not present in one of the parent directories (determined by `--assume-filename`), it will default to use the LLVM style.
